introAddressageIPV4_V1.3 : Slide 20

Trouvez L’adresse réseau , l’adresse de broadcast , la première
et la dernière adresse IP disponible.
A) 192.168.27.12 255.255.255.0
B) 192.168.28.13 255.255.255.0
C) 192.168.13.28 255.255.0.0
D) 172.16.28.34 255.255.255.0
E) 172.16.197.64 255.255.255.0
F) 172.31.172.26 255.255.255.0
G) 172.28.192.12 255.255.0.0
H) 172.30.9.192 255.0.0.0

A  r: 192.168.27.0 b: 192.168.27.255 frst: 192.168.27.1 lst: 192.168.27.254 msk: 255.255.255.0
B  r: 192.168.28.0 b: 192.168.28.255 frst: 192.168.28.1 lst: 192.168.28.254 msk: 255.255.255.0
C  r: 192.168.0.0 b: 192.168.255.255 frst: 192.168.1.1 lst: 192.168.255.254 msk: 255.255.0.0
D  r: 172.16.28.0 b: 172.16.28.255 frst: 172.16.28.1 lst: 172.16.28.254 msk: 255.255.255.0
E  r: 172.16.197.0 b: 172.16.197.255 frst: 172.16.197.1 lst: 172.16.197.254 msk: 255.255.255.0
F  r: 172.31.172.0 b: 172.31.172.255 frst: 172.31.172.1 lst: 172.31.172.254 msk: 255.255.255.0
G  r: 172.28.0.0 b: 172 b: 172.28.255.255 frst: 172.28.1.1 lst: 172.28.255.254 msk: 255.255.0.0
H  r: 172.0.0.0 b: 172.255.255.255 frst: 172.1.1.1 lst: 172.255.255.254 msk: 255.0.0.0
